::Spears:;

She stood there in front of the door. "I can't allow you to escape. 
My life would be terminated if I let that happen."  She felt the tear 
roll down her cheeks again.  "I..I..I tried to.." she stopped as the 
program ran through her. "I belong to Master Prebon now."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker frowns, walking over to the hole. He glances at Spears' 
hand, 
> deciding it was best not to touch it, even though he had a bit of 
trouble 
> sticking to his decition. If these bots had technology to mind-
controll, 
> there was no telling what else they could do.
> 
> "Allright then," he says, walking up to the door, his shoulder 
blasters 
> emerging, "Stand back."
